headline: Apollo Funds Acquire Majority Stake in The State Group, A Leading Provider of Multi-Trade Services
summary: NEW YORK, Nov. 18, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo (NYSE: APO) today announced that funds associated with its Impact and Clean Transition strategies (the “Apollo Funds”) have acquired a majority stake in The State Group (“TSG” or the “Company”) from Blue Wolf Capital (“Blue Wolf”). Blue Wolf will retain a minority stake in the business, alongside existing management shareholders. headline: Trump expanding list of candidates for Treasury secretary
summary: After securing the presidency, Donald Trump is building his Cabinet for 2025 and has now added two new possible candidates for the role of Secretary of the Treasury. Trump is expected to meet with former Federal Reserve Governor Kevin Warsh and Apollo Global Management (APO) CEO Marc Rowan, as he’s looking for someone who can accomplish two goals: boosting market confidence while also supporting his proposed tariff policies. Yahoo Finance Washington Correspondent Ben Werschkul joins the Morning Brief to share insight into Trump's decision-making process around Cabinet positions. Catch Marc Rowan's full interview at the 2024 Yahoo Finance Invest conference. Disclosure: Yahoo Finance is owned by Apollo Global Management. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here. This post was written by Cindy Mizaku.

headline: Apollo Opens Seoul Office and Names Jay Hyun Lee Head of Korea as Part of Continued APAC Expansion
summary: Dr. Sam Young Chung to serve as Academic Advisor at Intersection of Retirement Solutions and Alternative AssetsNEW YORK, Nov. 17, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo (NYSE: APO) today announced it has opened an office in Seoul and that Jay Hyun Lee has joined the firm as a Partner and Head of Korea to help execute and build on its growth plans in the market.
